articles.title: Experts on Where Flu Cases are Rising and When to Get Your Flu Shot - Healthline
articles.description: While the flu shot appears to be a good match to the circulating strains, a recent survey found that nearly half of Americans don’t plan to get vaccinated against the flu this year. What, exactly, this means for this year’s flu season has yet to be seen, but …
articles.content:
• Health experts say this flu season is likely to be severe.
  • Currently, Texas, Georgia, and Washington D.C. are all seeing high flu activity and its only the beginning of flu season. <… [+7663 chars]
